simulator
Interface Observable

All Known Subinterfaces:
SimObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicObject, SimObjectImpl
public interface Observable

Implement the observer design pattern

Author:
Erick Lavoie

Method Summary
 void attach(Observer observer)
          Add an observer to the object
 void detach(Observer observer)
          Remove an observer from the object
 void notify(Event event)
          Notify every registered observer that an Event has occured
 

Method Detail

attach

void attach(Observer observer)
Add an observer to the object

Precondition:
observer is valid
Postcondition
observer is added to the list of observers

detach

void detach(Observer observer)
Remove an observer from the object

Precondition:
observer is valid
Postcondition
observer is removed from the list of observers

notify

void notify(Event event)
Notify every registered observer that an Event has occured

Precondition:
Event is valid
Postcondition
Every observer had received the event through its accept method
